about_the_game:
Welcome to Poodle Clicker, the most delightful clicker game you'll ever play! Dive into a world filled with adorable poodles of various colors and personalities, each bringing its own unique charm to your screen. Whether you're a casual gamer or a hardcore clicker enthusiast, Poodle Clicker has something for everyone!

Features:

Diverse Poodles:
Discover poodles of all colors and personalities. From the warrior and wizard poodles to heavy metal poodles, goth poodles to the punk poodles, each one has a distinct look and attitude, making every click a joyful experience.



36 Original Songs:
Enjoy a diverse soundtrack with 36 original songs that perfectly complement the vibe of the game. Each song adds to the fun and keeps you clicking along with the beat.
(This game is full of metal songs!!)

Three Exciting Modes:
Normal Mode: Keep your score on next gameplay. Perfect for a relaxed gaming experience.
Hardcore Mode: For the thrill-seekers! Your score resets every time, challenging you to beat your personal best in every session.
Timed Mode: Race against the clock with just 60 seconds to make as many clicks as possible. How high can you score under pressure?

Bonuses:
2x, 5x, Crit, +100, +250, +500 and AutoClick bonuses are the current bonuses will make you keep clicking!


Achievements and Leaderboards:
Compete with friends and other players worldwide. Achieve milestones and climb the leaderboards to become the ultimate poodle clicker.

Kennel Upgrades:
You can spend points to buy these upgrades. They will increase your click rate and automatically give you clicks as well!

Join the Fun:
Step into the charming world of Poodle Clicker and start your clicking adventure today. Whether you're playing in Normal Mode, testing your skills in Hardcore Mode, or racing against time in Timed Mode, there's endless fun to be had. Get ready to click and enjoy the cutest poodles on the planet!

Don't like AI?
If you don't like AI generated images or music, you can disable them in the main menu to replace them with real poodles and non AI generated music.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

name: Poodle Clicker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Graphics: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Free to Play Poodle Clicker is a game full of stylish Poodles and original Music, mostly melodic metal songs, but there are more!
